empty.title: Welcome to Deck

settings.title: Deck Settings
settings.nameDescription: Set the display name for this deck
settings.deleteDescription: Delete this deck. This operation cannot be undone.
settings.deleteConfirmation: Delete "{name}"? This operation cannot be undone.

account.title: Select Account
account.description: Choose the account to use for this deck

algorithm.title: Select Feed Type
algorithm.description: Choose the type of content to display

reverse_chronological.name: Home Timeline
reverse_chronological.description: Posts from users you follow in chronological order

top_posts.name: Popular Posts
top_posts.description: Posts with high engagement (likes and reposts)

best_of_follows.name: Best of Follows
best_of_follows.description: High-quality posts from users you follow

quiet_posters.name: Quiet Posters
quiet_posters.description: Prioritizes posts from users who post less frequently

loud_posters.name: Active Posters
loud_posters.description: Posts from users who post frequently

close_friends.name: Close Friends
close_friends.description: Posts from users you interact with frequently

popular_with_friends.name: Popular with Friends
popular_with_friends.description: Posts that your friends have liked or reposted

feedConfig.title: {feedType} Settings
feedConfig.helpText: If left blank, "{suggestedName}" will be auto-generated

accountSelector.allAccountsDescription: Display integrated information from all accounts
accountSelector.multiAccountDescription: This feed type can display integrated information from multiple accounts. Selecting "All Accounts" will show information from all logged-in accounts together.
accountSelector.singleAccountDescription: This feed type displays information tied to a specific account. Please select one account you want to display.

discovery.name: Discovery & Search
discovery.description: Feeds for discovering new content and topics

user.name: User Related
user.description: Feeds related to user connections and activities

home.name: Home
home.description: Display posts from users you follow in chronological order

notifications.name: Notifications
notifications.description: Likes, reposts, follows, replies and other notifications

search.name: Search
search.recommendation: Perfect for tracking specific topics or information

hashtag.name: Hashtag
hashtag.recommendation: Perfect for tracking specific genres or topics

trending.name: Trending
trending.description: Popular posts that are currently trending
trending.recommendation: Perfect for staying up with latest trends and topics

following.name: Following
following.description: Display list of users you follow

followers.name: Followers
followers.description: Display list of users who follow you
followers.recommendation: Perfect for checking and managing followers

list.name: List
list.description: Display posts from a specific user list
list.recommendation: Perfect for tracking specific groups or genres

customFeed.name: Custom Feed
customFeed.recommendation: Perfect for using special community-created feeds

settings.searchHelp: Use spaces to separate multiple keywords
settings.hashtagHelp: # will be added automatically. Supports Japanese and English hashtags
settings.listIdHelp: Enter Bluesky list ID or URI
settings.listNameHelp: Used for deck name. If blank, "List" will be used
settings.feedUriHelp: Enter feed URI starting with at:// or https://
settings.feedNameHelp: Used for deck name. If blank, "Custom Feed" will be used

login.title: Sign in with your Bluesky account
login.appPasswordGuide: How to create an app password

validation.authSaveFailed: Failed to save authentication information. Please try again.
validation.authFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your handle and app password.
validation.invalidFormat: Handle or password format is incorrect.
validation.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
validation.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
validation.timeoutError: Connection timed out. Please wait a moment and try again.
validation.invalidPassword: App password is invalid. Please create a new app password.
validation.accountNotFound: Account not found. Please check your handle.
validation.genericError: Login failed. Please wait a moment and try again.

root.migrationError: Error occurred during migration. Redirecting to login page...
root.redirectingToDeck: Already logged in. Redirecting to deck page...
root.error: An error occurred. Redirecting to login page...
root.migrationDescription: Migrating legacy data to new secure storage...

reauth.title: Account Reauthentication
reauth.description: Please enter your app password to refresh your session
reauth.sessionExpiredDescription: Your authentication has expired. Reauthentication is required to continue.

theme.autoScheduleDescription: Automatic theme switching based on time

theme.systemDescription: Automatically switches theme according to system settings
theme.lightDescription: Light and clean theme with bright background
theme.darkDescription: Dark theme that's easier on the eyes
theme.highContrastDescription: High contrast theme focused on accessibility
theme.scheduleError: Failed to change auto schedule settings
